description: Record-winners Egypt were one of favourites to add AFCON 2025 to their seven titles but focus turns to FIFA World Cup.
title: Egypt’s AFCON pain to spur World Cup bid as Nigeria bronze medal game looms

description: Wimbledon plans to treble the size of the existing site in London, adding 39 courts, but campaigners seek to block move.
title: Wimbledon tennis back in UK court with campaigners blocking expansion plans

description: President Radev expected to appoint caretaker cabinet, set a date for vote.
title: Bulgaria set for another snap election after protests oust government

description: Guryong, outside South Korean capital, carries high fire risk due to cramped homes built with combustible materials.
title: Residents flee as fire devastates Seoul shanty town

description: Tiny The Gambia was the first to take another country to the ICJ as a third-party rights defender.
title: Why The Gambia wants Myanmar punished for Rohingya genocide
